description:
Chibodee`s pit crew notice how strange Chibodee has been acting lately, so they run off to the Guyana Highlands. Chibodee chases them, and in the process he finds Domon and begins to train with him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hissatsuwaza o Nusume! Bijo Gundan no Daisakusen
Steal the Secret! Scheme of the Beautiful Warriors
Stiehl das Geheimnis! Die Intrige der schönen Kriegerinnen
Sus à la botte secrète ! Le complot des belles
必殺技を盗め! 美女軍団の大作戦
